data.author: Matthieu

changelog.release_notes: V1.4 add bluetooth state + vibe notification
V1.3 arrange for compile on aplite+basalt+chalk
V1.2 square design (not rounded in the config)
V1.1 correction bad date in mode 12h time

Big Digit.
Animation on change.
Refresh each minute (each seconde if you tap. just for 5 secondes for battery)
on tap Date or Secondes.
Choice of colours, Vibe , frequence Vibe.

data.description:
Big Digit Pixel Style with animation between digits.
Hour, Minute.
Refresh every minutes (on tap every secondes only 5 secondes)
on Tap : secondes or date
(seconds tap axis y, date tap axis  x ,light tap axis z. You can show the axis here:  https://developer.getpebble.com/guides/pebble-apps/sensors/accelerometer/   ) 
You can change colors , digits and background and choose vibes.


new bluetooth state with color config.


Français
Style pixel avec animation entre les chiffres.
Le rafraîchissement est toute les minutes pour preserver la pile.

si on secoue la montre de
 haut en bas--> lumière
droite gauche--> date
devant derrière --> seconde (pendant 5 secondes ensuite retours en mode minute)
Les couleurs sont configurables ainsi que les vibrations (type et frequence)

Etat du bluetooth avec la couleur dans les configs.

latest_release.release_notes: V1.4 add bluetooth state + vibe notification

data.title: pixMorphing
